doc.field: Title: Poor Lizzie Lee, of the heiress and coachman. The only full and authentic account of the secret marriage of Miss Lizzie Lee, the beautiful heiress, with her father's coachman, who was a scoundrel in disguise, and who, through the influence of the fashionable Madame La Farge was employed by Mr. LeeCity: PhiladelphiaPublisher: The Old Franklin Publishing HouseDate: 1884
